body.transcript:
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am with RT 6 Boozers. How may I assist you today?

Hi Sarah! I just had a question about my recent visit to the bar.

Of course! I would be happy to help. May I have your name, please?

Sure, it's John Smith.

Thank you, John! Now, could you please provide me with your phone number? I will need it to look up your visit.

It's four zero three, two one one, eight one one one.

Great! One more thing, could you also provide your email address for our records?

Sure! It's john.smith@example.com.

Thank you for that information, John. I’ve noted everything down. What issue did you experience during your visit?

I received the wrong drink order and it took a long time to get served.

I apologize for the inconvenience, John. We appreciate your feedback and will work to improve our service. Thank you for your time!
